GenAiPlugin.description: When user asks something about auto authorization related details.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If a user inquires about auto authorization, or the auto authorization failure reason, provide details on the process and requirements.
If the user needs further assistance beyond the provided information, offer to escalate to a human agent.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Identify and retrieve details related to auto authorization processes for quotes. It includes the details like why a Quote is not auto authorized. It will also identify the authorization method used for the Quote
